caption: My girlfriend is a resident of 220 Madison and I have visited here multiple times. Everyone who works there is so nice and makes you feel so welcomes especially Christin the property manager! I love going in the massage chair and their gym is amazing! They also have a theater on the 3rd floor which is great for watching movies.

Absolutely LOVE this place! Me and my roommates have been here since the beginning of the construction process and we have loved it ever since. Christin and Omar go above and beyond for us, and when we need them they come help us right away!
Really nice place to live for UT / USF kids, not bad price compared to the rest of downtown. Christin is probably the nicest landlord you’ll ever meet your life.

I have been living at 220 Madison for 2 years now, I was one of the first residents to live here and I love it!! It is so close to campus and there is so much to do downtown. Everyone here is so nice, Christin and Omar are the best!

As a regular guest at 220 (my boyfriend lives there), I love the building and everything it has to offer! I pay almost double where I live and dont have nearly the amount of amenities 220 does. The theatre room is awesome, along with the rest of the 3rd floor which is a great place to study!
Dope place! was w/my boys last week chillin and they had pizza for everyone. Im moving in when they have some space - kristen, dont forget about me (;

220 Madison is a perfect apartment for UT students. It is just a short walk to and from campus, has great places to eat all around, and the apartment comes fully furnished including a TV. Most of all, the property manager, Christin, is extremely caring and always works hard to make the living arrangements even better.
Great place.  Prime location.  Awesome Property manager.  Christin is very helpful and accommodating with any questions or concerns you might have.

As a UTampa student, 220 Madison is in a prime location for me. It’s an easy walk to campus, and on days when I’m in a rush or it’s raining I take the 220 shuttle or use the free bike service offered right outside the building. The apartments are modern and as a bonus it was nice to have the place fully furnished when moving in. The amenities are super nice, I use the gym and massage chair daily. Being in the middle of downtown I feel very safe in 220 with FOB locks on the lobby doors, elevator access, and locks on my apartment door and bedroom door. Christin is the property manager and she is awesome. She’s always so accommodating for everything you need, sometimes I go to her office just to hangout and talk. The 220 team consistently offers covid-safe socials for its residents, my favorite is the free pizza almost every week. For anyone looking for a nice place to live in the heart of downtown Tampa, 220 Madison is the place to be!

I’ve been living at 220 Madison for a semester now and there’s so many great things about it. The location is perfect. It’s right downtown and it’s 5 minutes away from UT. There’s so many restaurants and fun things to do around. It also comes furnished and utilities are already included. My friends and I love hanging out at the movie room.
Best place to be at if you do not have a car. Centrally located to where you can walk to most of Tampa's hot spots.

220 is amazing! The amenities are great, it’s really geared toward students and the views are breathtaking. Christin has been wonderful in how she cares for all of her residents. Definitely the best student housing Tampa has to offer.
Lived here for a year and it was awesome. Super close to campus and plenty of space in the study areas. Everyone here is super nice and helpful!
Worked on site during the construction stage and know the staff well. I would say these students are not only in a well rehabbed building, but are in good hands with the property Manager Kristin.

220 Madison is not only a great place to live but the people who work there are so welcoming and nice. Christin is so kind and helpful she made our decision so easy. She makes everything feel like home. Whenever we have a question or concern, she is always there. The apartments are very clean and furnished. I highly recommend living here!

220 Madison is so lucky to have Christin!! Making the scary transition of living on your own was completely put at ease because of Christin. She welcomed both my sister and I with open arms and love. Even before we made the move, she was always there to answer all of our questions and concerns. She always goes above and beyond to make sure we are comfortable and happy. Not only do we love our apartment but the overall building is very well runned and clean. Christin is kind hearted, compassionate, and always puts others first. If I ever need anything I know she is there. 220 Madison has been everything we wanted and more thanks to Christin!

220 Madison is the perfect student housing, it is a short distance from UT campus, restaurants, convenient stores and includes amazing amenities. The security is great and most of all Christin is extraordinary. She makes everyone feel so welcomed and tries her best to make it feel like a home.  She is extremely dependable and understanding. Overall I enjoyed my time at 220.
Had a great stay at 220, the building is modern and the amenities + distance to campus make the price amazing for the area. Great views and the staff is extremely accommodating, especially Christin!

As a former international student, probably one of the best decisions made to stay at 220 Madison. Reasons being:  1. Friendly staff, Christin, the leasing manager is super helpful and friendly towards students and always there to help out!  2. Rent includes all utilities ( Gym, Electricity, water, study rooms,etc)  3. Great amenities for a student housing  for the price and location.  4. Alot of restaurants within a .5 mile radius and is a 5-7 min walk to campus (U of Tampa) and is just off the riverwalk too. You will not need a car to commute and is the closest off-campus housing for a college student.  5. Maintenance requests have a quick turn around time.  6. Apartment/building bonding activities and events held every 1-2 months  7. Amazon hub lockers and free street bike access!  All in all, great experience, living there my senior year and could not have asked for a better place. Seems like they are still looking to upgrade further and great value for money.

I was honesty surprised at the welcoming and friendly atmosphere at 220 Madison, when showing up for a tour unannounced for my niece that was  looking for better off campus housing options alternative to what was offered in proximity to USF. The property manager Kristin gave us a detailed tour of the building, amenities and different apartment layouts. The building was very clean and tasteful. My niece selected this for the fall semester living options and has been extremely happy with her choice. I highly recommend 220 Madison.

Christin is an asset to this student housing!  We were warmly welcomed when bringing my nieces to college.  She greeted us with a smile and was completely accommodating.  It was so comforting to know she was there and always available for their needs.  She always answers her phone and texts.  I can tell the kids all love her.  Omar is very nice also.  He seemed truly concerned about our needs.  The apartment is clean and furnished.  The laundry room and gym are great.  This is a well organized and clean apartment building.  It’s so difficult dropping off kids at college but knowing Christin was there made it easier.  I know they are in good hands. THANK YOU CHRISTIN.  You are amazing.... From Marietta & Aunt Judy

I cannot say enough about this property!!! Absolutely amazing...Our entire experience could not have been any better the manager Christin from my first phone call in the beginning of May was extremely helpful and made us feel so welcome... She really goes above and beyond for her tenants from start to finish!!! Prior to finding this property we searched out several other properties and she honestly was just so accommodating and very sweet. For myself I only have one child and was very hesitant to allow him to move on his own but, she truly is like a mother to these kids!!! So with that being said I knew this was his home away from home!!!! Thank you christin for all that you do my husband and I really appreciate you!!!

Christin is one of the most kind-hearted and helpful people I’ve ever come in contact with. She does all that she can to make things work, and for that I’m grateful! 220 Madison is a beautiful apartment building and they go above & beyond for their residents. I wish I could bring 220 Madison (yes, the entire building) with me on all my future endeavors. 6/5 stars.

I love the property and the amenities(the movie theatre❤️)!!! Being downtown is always great. They provide transportation to campus or you also have the option of a healthy 10 minute walk to campus. The community events make you feel like family.

Awesome place to live and very conveniently located right downtown! Both the owner Omar and the property manager Christin as well as the maintenance guy Denis were all extremely helpful through out my time living here! Highly recommend!

As a parent of a UT student, my daughter's decision to move off campus made me uncomfortable at first, especially since we lived out-of-state. 220 Madison was a great option! Not only was it an extremely safe location but also very convenient. Location was ideal especially since my daughter did not have a vehicle. The apartments themselves were well designed and built. I also want to give a special shout out to Christin, the leasing agent/ manager. Christin was on site and always available to my daughter or for me if I had any questions. We recommend 220 Madison!

As a parent, quite honestly I was more than apprehensive about taking my kid off campus and getting her "her own space". I am soooo happy we found 220 Madison early!  We had a great selection of apartments and my daughter decided which unit she wanted. Over the course of construction both Omar and Christin reassured us that not only would the facility be top notch, but extremely safe and convenient. They didn't disappoint!  Since move in, we became very close to Christin who isn't only the building manager but is a friend and "mom" to the kids. She is genuine and sincere and definitely looks out for all of the kids' best interests. It'll be tough to find a follow-on landlord that will be as good once my daughter graduates.

I have been affiliated with not only staff members but residents as well at 220 Madison since their opening in Sept 2019, I can whole heartedly say that this is the best valued off campus, student housing in Downtown Tampa. From the fully furnished apartments, to the amazing views, unique amenities and the tremendously helpful staff I would highly suggest this community to anyone looking for affordable housing.

I moved into 220 Madison last fall and have loved every second of it. When living here was still just an option, I was not only conflicted about where I wanted to live, but late on getting to it because of the lack of student housing near The University of Tampa. The leasing agent Christin made this process as stress free as possible and did everything in her power to keep me happy and confident when making my decision. Now Christin is my favorite face to see coming out of the 3rd floor elevator when going to the gym, study rooms, to do my laundry, or to just talk things out with. She truly cares, is hands on, and will go above and beyond for the students living here. Because of her and those who have worked so hard in maintaining 220, it has really made me feel at home every single day.
Great location, and the staff is amazing!

I love living in 220 Madison! It is very difficult to find apartments in the downtown area with student friendly prices and even more difficult to find apartments that include furniture and amenities in the price (electricity, gas, WiFi, etc). The building includes a laundry room, a gym, and great study rooms in the common area (third floor). Also, another bonus point is the building manager Christin Hills (Absolute Legend ) who is very responsible and amazing at her job, something that is also difficult to find in other apartments.

Christin Hillis is one of the most genuine, efficient property managers I have ever had the pleasure to meet. On a weekly, if not daily basis, she walks through every portion of the 220 Madison to ensure the complex is well-maintained and diligently updates 220 Madison residents with any events or happenings that could impact their wellness, no matter how slight the chance. Ms. Hillis is also readily available in person, via phone, and by email to assist residents in the complex, who are both students and professionals, with any inquiries  or needs they have, be that physical, mental, or emotional. Her open and warm personality welcomes you to the community similar to that of a family member or a friend. Ms. Hillis consistently places the needs of the residents above her own to guarantee that each resident, even friends of residents, feel safe and comfortable in their surroundings. Every matter discussed with Ms. Hillis is taken to heart, and I feel very fortunate to have become acquainted with her through residing at the 220 Madison.

I moved to Madison 220 about four months ago. This is a very nice apartment complex in the downtown area. It is located in the heart of downtown and the staff is very friendly. The walk to campus is easy and fast. They also provide a shuttle if you dont feel like walking. Since its a student apartment complex that also makes it way better.
This is a great place to live off-campus and everyone working at 220 are the nicest people I've ever met!

I couldn't have chosen a better place to move to when I decided to move off-campus this semester. The apartments are brand new and amazing, and they also have the best staff ever, especially Christin. She can help you with everything, and she will go above and beyond for you! Thank you for getting me into 220 Madison. Best place to live off-campus!

My daughter just moved into her new home at 220 Madison. Though it required temporary lodging and a mass move-In, the end result is a wonderful thing. I want to say all those who assisted at move-in including Christin Hillis, Melissa Ramirez. Melis Garcia and Ashleigh worked extremely hard to make the weekend a success!!! Thank you very very much!!! A special thank you to Christin for all her assistance from the beginning of my daughter’s application and continuing to this day! Well done!!

My daughter is so excited to move in to 220 Madison! I want to give a  shout out to Christin Hillis for all the advise and help she gave her! She was so helpful and thats what made her  decision to live there ! Can’t wait for my daughters new adventure living on her own in a safe community ! Thanks Christin !
(Translated by Google) I am constituting the terminal the photos give the information of the place  (Original) Estoy constituyendo a terminal las fotos dan la  información  del lugar
Spoke with OWNER PARTNER LOOKS GREAT
